title: Wise T. Owl's Story of Money (Wise T. Owl's Picture Story Books for Little Children, #1).
description: Wise T. Owl's Story of Money is the first of the Wise T. Owl's picture story books series to be published.In this book, Wise T. Owl narrates a brief history of the evolution of money. Suitable for story-time and beginning or advanced primary school readers. Illustrations lend humour and provoke further thought.Some of the questions addressed in this topic are: Where did money come from? What is money based on? Why do we need money? How is the value decided? Who uses money?This book is designed as a springboard for further discussion, learning and research - a tool for parents, homeschoolers and teachers.Available from Author's website: www.wiseowlstorybooks.com.au
author: Maureen Nathan
